list.en: What's your sign?
Sagittarius is fire energy.
Scorpio is a water element and this makes it a somewhat enigmatic sign.
list.cn: 天蝎座是水相星座，这使它成为一个有点神秘的星座。

list.en: Leo is fired to the core.
list.cn: 狮子座被彻底地激怒了。

list.en: The earth element of taurus brings strength and the desire for solid ground form and structure.
list.cn: 土相星座的特质给金牛座带来了脚踏实地的力量和欲望。

list.en: Pisces is extremely receptive, compassionate and other directed.
list.cn: 双鱼座非常善于接受，富有同情心，而且很有主见。

list.en: Diligence is virgo's advantage.
Good memory is cancer born gift.
list.cn: 好的记忆力是癌症天生的天赋。

list.en: Libra represents the air element.
Libra has a sign.
Libra has a sign that is more extroverted and active.
list.cn: 天秤座的性格更外向、更积极。

list.en: Study would never be a problem for scorpio.
list.cn: 学习对天蝎座来说从来都不是问题。

list.en: Patience and caution are capricorn's advantages.
list.cn: 耐心和谨慎是摩羯座的优点。

list.en: Capricorn is the leader of the earth signs.
list.cn: 摩羯座是土相星座的领袖。

list.en: Clever advertisements attract people to spend money.
list.cn: 巧妙的广告吸引人们花钱。

list.en: Do you read advertisements?
Why don't you put an advertisement in the paper to sell that old car?
list.cn: 你为什么不在报纸上登广告卖掉那辆旧车呢?

list.en: We hired an advertising company for.
list.cn: 我们雇了一家广告公司。

list.en: We hired an advertising company for help to sell our products.
list.cn: 我们雇了一家广告公司来帮助销售我们的产品。

list.en: There is too much advertising gimmickry.
What do you think about this advertisement?
list.cn: 你觉得这个广告怎么样?

list.en: I'm an advertisement writer.
I receive a lot of advertisement matters.
He is skinny.
He is overweight.
You both are very slim.
You are slim enough.
I try to say.
I try to stay slim.
You're skinny enough without going on a diet.
She goes to the fitness center every day in order to lose weight.
list.cn: 为了减肥，她每天都去健身中心。

list.en: Eating too much will make you fat.
Weigh yourself often and you may decide to lose weight.
list.cn: 经常称体重，你可能会决定减肥。

list.en: My weight keeps going up, although I try not to eat too much.
list.cn: 虽然我尽量不吃太多，但我的体重还是不断增加。

list.en: I really need to lose some weight.
The weight is too much for my height.
list.cn: 这个体重对我的身高来说太重了。

list.en: You were just putting on a little weight.
You can't live without our family.
list.cn: 没有我们家你活不下去。

list.en: When there is a family, there is a god.
Do you see your parents often?
list.cn: 你经常见到你的父母吗?

list.en: East, west, home is best.
list.cn: 东好西好，还是自己家好。

list.en: There was a skeleton in every house.
list.cn: 每家每户都有一具骷髅。

list.en: My daughter gets my nose.
list.cn: 我女儿长得像我的鼻子。

list.en: My mother is very gentle.
I see my family often.
I'm an Apple of I.
My brother is easy going.
How do you think of our parents?
list.cn: 你觉得我们的父母怎么样?

list.en: My younger brother is still at high school.
Do you have any brothers or sisters?
How many children do you have?
Do you like your family?
What courses are you planning to take?
Are you busy with your study this term?
I'm very good at Chinese.
I'm very poor in math.
This class is very boring.
What other subjects did you learn?
list.cn: 你还学了什么其他科目?

list.en: Do you like your present major?
list.cn: 你喜欢你现在的专业吗?

list.en: What are you going to study?
What's your major?
What courses do you offer for next term?
list.cn: 下学期你们开设什么课程?

list.en: You shouldn't make a hasty decision when choosing a pet.
list.cn: 选择宠物时，你不应该草率决定。

list.en: Can your cats do any tricks yet?
I'm thinking about getting a pet.
How many pets do you have?
I wish I had a dog.
Let's take the dog for a walk.
What do you feed your pet?
My dog is spoiled by us.
I can't bear raising a mouse in the house.
list.cn: 我不能忍受在家里养老鼠。

list.en: It is quite a thrill to see a real movie star in the flesh.
list.cn: 亲眼见到真正的电影明星是件令人激动的事。

list.en: I went too late to see that film star.
list.cn: 我去得太晚了，没能见到那个电影明星。

list.en: Who is the host of the variety show?
list.cn: 这个综艺节目的主持人是谁?

list.en: What is the subject of that talk show?
list.cn: 那个谈话节目的主题是什么?

list.en: She is a bankable movie star.
list.cn: 她是个卖座的电影明星。

list.en: He is a television star.
He is a very popular folk singer.
list.cn: 他是一位非常受欢迎的民谣歌手。

list.en: Who is in this movie?
Jackie Chan is a very famous movie star in Hong Kong.
list.cn: 成龙是香港非常著名的电影明星。

list.en: My favorite star is marilyn monroe.
list.cn: 我最喜欢的明星是玛丽莲·梦露。

list.en: Do you have any hobbies?
Are you interested in Golf?
list.cn: 你对高尔夫球感兴趣吗?

list.en: His interests are manifold.
I'm not keen on jazz.
I have a bent for art.
I'm very interested in popular songs.
list.cn: 我对流行歌曲很感兴趣。

list.en: I prefer Golf as a hobby.
list.cn: 我更喜欢高尔夫球作为一种爱好。

list.en: One of my hobbies is painting.
Fishing is my main hobby.
Fishing is my main hobby.
I like Chinese chess.
I'm fond of music.
I have no hobby in particular.
My hobby is arranging flowers.
She gets a big mouth.
He's a lazy guy.
What's his girlfriend s height?
list.cn: 他女朋友的身高是多少?

list.en: Tom is not 22 yet.
Her sister is very plump.
His grandfather is advanced in age.
Do you know the man with the beard?
list.cn: 你认识那个留胡子的人吗?

list.en: How slender the girl is.
The little boy's nose is flat.
list.cn: 这个小男孩的鼻子是扁的。

list.en: He's a fine looking man, while his wife is plain.
list.cn: 他是个英俊的男人，而他的妻子相貌平平。

list.en: Susan has reached a married age.
Although she's beautiful in appearance, she's too ugly in her heart.
list.cn: 虽然她的外表很漂亮，但她的内心却很丑陋。

list.en: I'm starting to buy organic foods only.
I'm going to start protecting the environment more.
list.cn: 我要开始更多地保护环境。

list.en: What can we do to protect the environment?
list.cn: 我们能做些什么来保护环境?

list.en: Are you doing anything to help the environment?
list.cn: 你在做什么保护环境的事情吗?

list.en: I'm going green.
Are you trying to help the environment?
list.cn: 你是在努力保护环境吗?

list.en: I think things I recycle are more than I throw away.
list.cn: 我认为我回收的东西比我扔掉的东西多。

list.en: What's your IQ?
Which do you think is more important, IQ or EQ?
list.cn: 你认为智商和情商哪个更重要?

list.en: I do think EQ has much influence in promoting.
list.cn: 我确实认为情商对提升有很大的影响。

list.en: What did you score on your IQ test?
list.cn: 你的智商测试得了多少分?

list.en: Some people believe that EQ can be developed.
list.cn: 有些人认为情商是可以培养的。

list.en: He's really good at sports, but he's not so great at studying.
list.cn: 他很擅长运动，但他不太擅长学习。

list.en: I probably did so badly in school because my IQ is so low.
list.cn: 我在学校表现这么差可能是因为我的智商太低了。
